name: ryanrishi-com
description: Repo for my personal website, ryanrishi.com

scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development concurrently -c green,cyan "webpack --config webpack.dev.js" "bundle exec jekyll serve -D"
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.production.js && bundle exec jekyll build

author: Ryan Rishi <ryan@ryanrishi.com>
